issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Currently, when you are building an app, you see a nice table like:

{code}
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.11.5
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 8
  Memory                      = 17179869184
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 4.4.3
  npm Version                 = 2.15.1
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.8
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 5.3.1.GA
  SDK Path                    = /Users/user1/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/5.3.1.GA
  Target Platform             = iphone
Command
{code}

It would be neat to also add the used Alloy version in this table.
fields.summary: Print the alloy version on console when building your app

comments.body: Hello, Thanks for your request. Our engineers will consider it.
